mapper.insert: insert into media_wechat_info ( channel_id, area_id, first_price, second_price, other_price, remark, audit_status, status, created_user ) values ( #{channelId}, #{areaId}, #{firstPrice}, #{secondPrice}, #{otherPrice}, #{remark}, #{auditStatus}, #{status}, #{createdUser} )
mapper.select: select wechat_media_id wechatMediaId, channel_id channelId, area_id areaId, first_price firstPrice, second_price secondPrice, other_price otherPrice, remark remark, audit_user auditUser, audit_status auditStatus, audit_date auditDate, status status, created_user createdUser from media_wechat_info where wechat_media_id = #{wechatMediaId}
SELECT t.area_id areaId, a.area_name areaName FROM media_wechat_info t INNER JOIN system_area_info a ON a.area_id = t.area_id WHERE t.audit_status = 1 GROUP BY t.area_id
mapper.update: update media_wechat_info set audit_status = #{auditStatus}, audit_user = #{auditUser}, audit_date = #{auditDate} where wechat_media_id = #{wechatMediaId}
